data.prayer: Lord, please give the 2,893 believers in the county of Hapur the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hapur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Hapur that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary: On average, 55 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Hapur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 256,916, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Hapur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Hapur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Hapur, Uttar Pradesh, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary:
the county of Hapur, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 263,000.

We estimate Hapur has 2,893 people who might know Jesus, 3,191 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 256,916 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Hapur.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
